project.name: casalib
project.description: A haXe port of "CASA Lib for ActionScript"(http://casalib.org/). It is a great collection of helpful classes that streamline your coding. Non-Flash-only parts are also usable on JS/PHP/Neko/C++ targets.
project.version: First release. Complete and roughly tested. Ported from Casa Lib 1.3.0 (SVN Revision 371).
